elites.title: Kill Team Ironmaw
elites.desc: Flexible ranged infantry squad that can choose between weapon packages when deployed. Their vortex grenades slow enemies and mark them for death, dealing damage over time and remaining as long as the Deathwatch attack the target.

docs.name: Deathwatch Command - Land Speeder Mark
docs.desc: Land Speeders apply a Debuff to their target. Increases Damage Taken and Reveals the target for a duration. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

docs.name: Deathwatch Presence - Death from Above
docs.desc: Deathwatch can be deployed anywhere you have vision. When the Deathwatch are deployed, your other Elites can be deployed around the Deathwatch.

elites.title: Librarian Jonah Orion
elites.desc: Flexible infantry spellcaster with dual-natured abilities that enhance allies while controlling and damaging enemies. Can summon a ring of stone around himself that absorbs shots and blocks movement.

docs.name: Jonah Orion's Command - Blind Grenade
docs.desc: Scount grenades Blind and Silence the enemy for a duration. The duration increases as you Tier up. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

docs.name: Jonah Orion's Presence - Standard Stonewall
docs.desc: When Jonah Orion is deployed, the Standard erects a magical barrier in a Circle around itself. Blocks movement and Absorbs shots that pass through it.

elites.title: Chaplain Diomedes
elites.desc: Melee infantry unit capable of withstanding conisderable punishment and enhancing allies. Diomedes critical strikes empower his allies and increase in potency the longer he remains in combat.

docs.name: Diomedes' Command - Final Slam
docs.desc: Instead of dying, the Dreadnought activates Slam and Heals enough to avoid death. Only triggers once. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

docs.name: Diomedes' Presence - Rosarius
docs.desc: When Diomedes is deployed, elites become temporarirly Invulnerable for a duration instead of dying. Has a long Cooldown between uses.

elites.title: Gabriel Angelos
elites.desc: Melee infantry unit that specializes in high area of effect damage and disruption. Gabriel's legendary hammer God-Splitter charges up over time, imbuing his abilities with additional properties.

docs.name: Gabriel Angelos' Command - Slam Barrier
docs.desc: The Dreadnought's Slam ability creates a temporary barrier. Absorbs shots and Reflects projectiles. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

docs.name: Gabriel Angelos' Presence - Inspiring Drop
docs.desc: When Gabriel is deployed, Drop Pods Heal in a Circle upon landing.

elites.title: Terminators
elites.desc: Heavy ranged infatry squad equipped with assault cannons that damage and slow in a line in-front of them. Terminators can teleport into position and bombard an area with cyclone missiles.

docs.name: Terminators' Presence - Devastation
docs.desc: When Terminators are deployed, Devastator Marines with Heavy Bolters no longer have to setup or tear down their weapons.

docs.name: Terminators' Command - Focused Shot
docs.desc: Devastors fire a focused lascannon shot at the target vehicle. Causees Silence, Slow and Disables Attacks. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

elites.title: Assault Terminators
elites.desc: Heavy melee infatry squad that specializes in killing heavily armoured targets and structures. Can teleport into position and disrupt enemies in a large area.

docs.name: Assault Terminators' Presence - Charging Slam
docs.desc: When the Assault Terminators are deployed, the Dreadnought can charge in the target direction. Causes Damage, Knockback and Vehicle Stuns to units it passes through. At the end of his charge, or when activated during the charge the Dreadnought performs a Slam. They lose the ability to perform Slam without initiating a Charging Slam.

docs.name: Assault Terminators' Command - Focused Shot
docs.desc: Tactical Marines throw a grenade at the target position. Causes Knockback and Damage in a Circle. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

elites.title: Venerable Dreadnought
elites.desc: Ranged walker effective against heavily armoured targets and structures. Its plasma cannon can unleash a devasting shot that deals high damage and leaves behind a smoldering crater that deals damage over time in an area.

docs.name: Venerable Dreadnought's Presence - Plasma Stor
docs.desc: When the Venerable Dreadnought is deployed, Tactical Marine Plasma Guns do not overheat.

docs.name: Venerable Dreadnought's Command - Assault Leap
docs.desc: Assault Marines perform a low flying leap in the target direction. Causes Damage to units it passes through. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

elites.title: Imperial Knight Paladin
elites.desc: Super Heavy walker with powerful ranged and melee attacks. The Palidin can project its shield in a direction independent of its own facing, absorbing any shots that would otherwise pass through it.

docs.name: Paladin's Presence - Piercing Shot
docs.desc: >When the Imperial Knight Paladin is deployed, the Predator Destructor can fire a powerful shot in the target direction. The projectile Pierces, doing Damage to units it passes through.

docs.name: Paladin's Command - Shield Wall
docs.desc: Devastator Marines gain a Shield if they've been stationary for a duration. Moving removes the Shield but if it is destroyed or the unit is disabled, it will take time fo rthe Shield to regenerate. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

elites.title: Imperial Knight Solaria
elites.desc: Super Heavy ranged walker built to deal exceptional area of effect damage to all targets. Sustained attacks will cause her to overheat, reducing movement speed but adding unique properties to her abilities.

docs.name: Solaria's Presence - Inferno Missiles
docs.desc: When Solaria is deployed, Whirlwind rockets leave behind a pool of fire when they explode. Causes Damage over time in a Circle.

docs.name: Solaria's Command - Fire on Move
docs.desc: Tactical Marines equipped with bolters can fire on the move but do so less rapidly than when stationary. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

infantry.name: Jonah Orion's Command - Blind Grenade
infantry.desc: Scount grenades Blind and Silence the enemy for a duration. The duration increases as you Tier up. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

infantry.name: Solaria's Command - Fire on Move
infantry.desc: Tactical Marines equipped with bolters can fire on the move but do so less rapidly than when stationary. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

infantry.name: Paladin's Command - Shield Wall
infantry.desc: Devastator Marines gain a Shield if they've been stationary for a duration. Moving removes the Shield but if it is destroyed or the unit is disabled, it will take time fo rthe Shield to regenerate. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

infantry.name: Assault Terminators' Command - Frag Grenade
infantry.desc: Tactical Marines throw a grenade at the target position. Causes Knockback and Damage in a Circle. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

infantry.name: Pin
infantry.desc: Devastators use their heavy bolters to Immobilize the target. The ability is cancelled if the target is Disabled, Jumps, Teleports or is behind a Shot Absorber.

infantry.name: Hidden
infantry.desc: Snipers that remain stationary in Stealth Cover for a duration gain Stealth that persists even if they leave. Stealth is removed if they attack or get Detected.

infantry.name: Overwatch
infantry.desc: Scout Snipers set watch on a Circle around a target position. When an enemy steps into the Circle area, Scout Snipers fire with increased Attack Speed at the target and get a bonus shot for each Charge they've accumulated. Scout Snipers build up to 10 Charges over time while Overwatch is channeling.

infantry.name: Tireless
infantry.desc: Tactical Marines increase Speed when not in combat.

infantry.name: Scout Strike
infantry.desc: When Scouts are Stealthed they do bonus Damage on their initial attack.

infantry.name: Slow Death
infantry.desc: The Tactical Marines Flamer ability Slows Infantry and Immobilizes Vehicles.

infantry.name: Cover Fire
infantry.desc: If Scout Snipers are in Stealth or Heavy Cover their ranged attacks Slow.

infantry.name: Improved Scope
infantry.desc: Devastator Marines have increased weapon range while in Stealth or Heavy Cover.

infantry.name: Venerable Dreadnought's Command - Assault Leap
infantry.desc: Assault Marines perform a low flying leap in the target direction. Causes Damage to units it passes through. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

infantry.name: Terminators' Command - Focused Shot
infantry.desc: Devastors fire a focused lascannon shot at the target vehicle. Causees Silence, Slow and Disables Attacks. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

vehicle.name: Thunderhawk Re-Deployement
vehicle.desc: The Whirlwind calls in a Thunderhawk that re-deploys them to the target position after a delay.

vehicle.name: Destructor Devastation
vehicle.desc: When a Predator Destructor deals Damage it gains a temporary increase in weapon range and Attack Speed. Can stack multiple times.

vehicle.name: Lone Wolf
vehicle.desc: Land Speeders fight harder when they are behind enemy lines. Increases Damage and reduces Damage Taken when not near allies in a Circle.

vehicle.name: Gabriel Angelos' Command - Slam Barrier
vehicle.desc: The Dreadnought's Slam ability creates a temporary barrier. Absorbs shots and Reflects projectiles. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

vehicle.name: Deathwatch Command - Land Speeder Mark
vehicle.desc: Land Speeders apply a Debuff to their target. Increases Damage Taken and Reveals the target for a duration. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

vehicle.name: Diomedes' Command - Final Slam
vehicle.desc: Instead of dying, the Dreadnought activates Slam and Heals enough to avoid death. Only triggers once. When reaching Level 8, this Doctrine is unlocked to be equipped as an Army Doctrine.

vehicle.name: Ablative Armour - Landspeeder
vehicle.desc: Land Speeders gain a Shield that regenerates.

vehicle.name: Invigorating Slam
vehicle.desc: Activating Slam invigorates the Dreadnought. Grants a temporary Shield that increases Speed while active. The bonus is only applied while Invigorating Slam has a Charge.

vehicle.name: Ablative Armour - Predator
vehicle.desc: Predators gain a Shield that regenerates.

structure.name: Blessings of the Omnissiah
structure.desc: Production Structures and Listening Posts Heal you and your allies' Vehicles in a Circle. Vehicles need to be out of combat for a while before they can Heal this way.

structure.name: Tip of the Spear
structure.desc: Your Listening Posts can be used to Reinforce yours and allied squads as well as Heal Elite Units.

structure.name: Improved Listening Post
structure.desc: Listening Posts you build have increased Health and do bonus Damage.

faction.name: Emperors Influence
faction.desc: Reduces the ability Cooldown of Plant the Standard.

faction.name: Improved Deathstorms
faction.desc: Deathstorm Drop Pods remain deployed for a longer period of time.

faction.name: Rapid Drop Pods
faction.desc: Orbital Relays become available sooner after deploying units from Drop Pods and Thunderhawks.
